short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit suspect COVID-19 URLs for inspection and get back results!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension was created to help those performing research against COVID infrastructure. It will allow users to submit suspect URLs, hostnames or domains to RiskIQ for crawling purposes. Results from the crawl will show up under submissions tab from the pop-up menu and link to a detailed report. Reports will include detailed information from the crawl, including referenced pages, screenshots and classification of content.
